text:
As they leave café "Le Moment" nestled in the corner of the city,
under one umbrella, the two head towards the station.

Their words are somewhat awkward,
but they walk, taking care not to get wet under the umbrella──

...Thanks for the help.
You really saved me.

Though, it's "Le Moment's" umbrella that you need
to thank. Not me.
...I wonder how the rain will be.

Looks like the rain will let up at my place.
Where's yours at?

Oh, it's further to the right──...
Around there.

Oh, it seems like it'll rain even harder by the time
we get home...

Oh, then why don't you go ahead and use this umbrella!
I'm already borrowing it though, so I'm not sure if I can lend it.

Oh, I appreciate it, but...
...are you sure it's fine?

How about we give it back together next time?
...And maybe exchange contact info too?

Sure, that sounds good.
Is "Line" okay?

Yup, it's here, I got it.
I'll send you a stamp!

Kaaay.
Guess I'll be seeing you next time.
